title: Adguard Premium v2.1.370 No Ads.apk
description:
Adguard Premium v2.1.370

Requirements: 4.0+

Overview:Blocks Ads Without Root
Adguard provides you with a reliable and manageable protection that immediately and without your participation filters the loading web pages. Adguard removes all the annoying ads, blocks loading of dangerous websites, and will not allow anyone to track your activities on the Internet.
When processing a web page, [b]Adguard does several things at once:
1. Removes ads and online tracking code directly from the page.
2. Checks a page against our database of phishing and malicious sites.
3. Checks apps downloaded from unknown sources.

WHAT'S NEW

Ad blocking Added 
Added popular filter subscriptions
New "Notification Icon" setting option: "Notification without icon"

So now we now have 4 options:
1. Default icon. Icon and notification are always visible.
2. Colored icon (only in Android 4.X). Icon and notification are always visible.
3. Notification without icon. Icon is not visible. Permanent notification is visible, but it has low priority, so it is semi-transparent and placed below all other notifications.
4 None. No icon, no notification.
Make "Protection paused" a permanent notification
When Adguard pauses protection, sometimes Android may kill it's process and then do not bring it back.

 Add a description text for each filter
 Change Mb to MB in firewall data statistics
 "Protection paused" notification should not have high priority in Android 4.X
 Changed the way Adguard checks domain

 Adguard now checks if IP address is reachable before redirecting connection to a proxy
 "Filter DNS requests" feature does not work with mobile connection

We have improved "Filter DNS requests" feature, now it is much more reliable and works for both Wi-Fi and Mobile connection. This feature may drastically improve the battery usage, so I recommend that beta testers to try it.
 Tethering/hotspot is falsely detected (MIUI, Zenfone2)
 Fixed an issue with filtering Boat Browser and Dolphin Browser with add-ons installed
 Viber app compatiblity issues
 Added RT Software Studio's Download Manager to the browsers list
 Added Yandex Browser Alpha to the browsers list
 Periscope app incompatibility

 Use keyboard settings to detect default language-specific filters
 Tethering/hotspot is falsely detected (second try)
 T-Mobile Wi-Fi calling issue
 Error while sending feedback
 Sites with Transfer-Encoding=chunked are broken in "Simplified" filtering mode
 Add Link Bubble Browser to the browsers list
 Improve release notes layout
 BOOT_COMPLETED Intent is not received at â€œRestartâ€ or â€œReboot"
 Adguard requests to a backend server has wrong User-Agent field
 Download or upload of large files may be broken: java.net.SocketTimeoutException
 Add sberbank app to net exclusions
 UDP connection may be closed before it is actually established
 Compress request body when sending request to support
 Wi-Fi direct does not work with Adguard on Samsung devices
 Always return status=500 for blocked requests
 Foreground check does not work in Android 5.1.1+
 Critical Error: Deadlock caused by slow write operations
 Random timeout error while downloading large files
 Adguard breaks WebSocket protocol
 Wildcard's "*" character does not match a new line
